coffee.donations: Donations of any amount will be help with motivation for new features.
coffee.help: If you want to help, you can donate.
coffee.hope: Whether you donate or simply share the game with others, I hope you have fun!
coffee.question: Having fun spinning?

credits.auranrage: For the help with data for some roulettes
credits.bulbapedia: For their trainer's Sprites which are being used in this project
credits.feedback: If you'd like share feedback, reach out on
credits.hope: Hope you can have fun with your friends and family playing this game :)
credits.images: All image contents of Pokémon and Pokémon related items are Copyright of The Pokémon Company.
credits.inspiration: This game was heavily inspired on the Victory Road Run from
credits.pokeapi: As a resource for this game's data and sprites

entei.prevents: Entei prevents Team Rocket from stealing your Pokémon.

adventure.title: What do you do between Gyms?

character.gender: Are you a boy or a girl?

prep.ready: Now get ready for the Elite 4.
prep.title: What do you do before the Elite 4?

potion.name: Potion
potion.description: Potion let you spin again whenever you would lose a Gym battle !

rare-candy.name: Rare Candy
rare-candy.description: Use a Rare Candy to Evolve your Pokémon anytime !

running-shoes.name: Running Shoes
running-shoes.description: Running Shoes let you spin the wheel twice between Gyms !

super-potion.name: Super Potion
super-potion.description: Super Potion let you spin again up to two times whenever you would lose a Gym battle !

x-attack.name: X Attack
x-attack.description: X Attack makes your Team stronger !

exp-share.name: Exp Share
exp-share.description: Whenever a Pokémon evolves, Exp Share makes another Pokémon evolve !

hyper-potion.name: Hyper Potion
hyper-potion.description: Hyper Potion let you spin again up to three times whenever you would lose a Gym battle !

escape-rope.name: Escape Rope
escape-rope.description: Escape Rope saves you from bad situations !

lorelei.name: Lorelei
lorelei.quote1: No one can best me when it comes to icy Pokémon.
lorelei.quote2: Freezing moves are powerful. Are you ready?

bruno-gen1.name: Bruno
bruno-gen1.quote1: Through rigorous training, people and Pokémon can become stronger without limit.
bruno-gen1.quote2: We will grind you down with our superior power! Hoo hah!

agatha.name: Agatha
agatha.quote1: You're the child that Oak's taken under his wing, aren't you?
agatha.quote2: I'll show you how a real Trainer battles!

lance.name: Lance
lance.quote1: You can call me Lance the dragon Trainer.
lance.quote2: Your League challenge ends with me!

will.name: Will
will.quote1: I am Will. I have trained all around the world, making my Psychic-type Pokémon powerful.
will.quote2: I can only keep getting better! Losing is not an option!

koga.name: Koga
koga.quote1: A mere child like you dares to challenge me?
koga.quote2: I shall show you true terror as a ninja master!

bruno-gen2.name: Bruno
bruno-gen2.quote1: You look determined. Perfect for battle!
bruno-gen2.quote2: You will bow down to our overwhelming power! Hoo hah!

karen.name: Karen
karen.quote1: How amusing. I love Dark-type Pokémon.
karen.quote2: I'm known for my overpowering tactics.
karen.quote3: Just try to entertain me. Let's go.

sidney.name: Sidney
sidney.quote1: I like that look you're giving me.
sidney.quote2: I guess you'll give me a good match. That's good!

phoebe.name: Phoebe
phoebe.quote1: Ahahaha! I'm Phoebe of the Elite Four.
phoebe.quote2: See if you can even inflict damage on my Pokémon!

glacia.name: Glacia
glacia.quote1: All I have seen are challenges by weak Trainers
glacia.quote2: I wonder what you will show me.

drake.name: Drake
drake.quote1: do you know what it takes to battle alongside Pokémon as partners?
drake.quote2: If you don't, you will never prevail over me

aaron.name: Aaron
aaron.quote1: Would you like to know why I take on challengers?
aaron.quote2: It's because I want to become perfect, just like my bug Pokémon!
aaron.quote3: Ok! Let me take you on!

bertha.name: Bertha
bertha.quote1: Well, well. You're quite the adorable Trainer!
bertha.quote2: Would you show this old lady how much you've learned?

flint.name: Flint
flint.quote1: You're facing a Fire-type Pokémon user with me.
flint.quote2: Let Flint see how hot your spirit burns!

lucian.name: Lucian
lucian.quote1: I must say, you've already proven yourself to be outstanding by coming this far.
lucian.quote2: I'm afraid I will have to go all out against you.

shauntal.name: Shauntal
shauntal.quote1: Excuse me. You're a challenger, right?
shauntal.quotes2: I'm the Elite Four's Ghost-type Pokémon user, Shauntal, and I shall be your opponent.

marshal.name: Marshal
marshal.quote1: I'm training under my mentor, Alder.
marshal.quote2: My mentor sees your potential as a Trainer and is taking an interest in you.

grimsley.name: Grimsley
grimsley.quote1: Life is a serious battle, and you have to use the tools you're given.
grimsley.quote2: Let us begin. And may the best Trainer win!

caitlin.name: Caitlin
caitlin.quote1: You appear to possess a combination of strength and kindness.
caitlin.quote2: Make your best effort not to bore me with a yawn-inducing battle. Clear?

malva.name: Malva
malva.quote1: Welcome, challenger, to my Blazing Chamber!
malva.quote2: I am Malva, and I shall be your opponent today.

siebold.name: Siebold
siebold.quote1: I have a question I must pose to you.
siebold.quote2: Do you think Pokémon battling can ever be worthy of being called an art?

wikstrom.name: Wikstrom
wikstrom.quote1: Let us both give our word that our contest shall be fair and honorable.

drasna.name: Drasna
drasna.quote1: You must be a strong Trainer... That's just wonderful news!
drasna.quote2: Facing opponents like you and your team will make my Pokémon grow like weeds!

molayne.name: Molayne
molayne.quote1: Kukui asked me to, so I decided to be in the Elite Four.
molayne.quote2: I'm looking forward to battling against you and Sophocles in the Pokémon League.

olivia.name: Olivia
olivia.quote1: No introduction needed here. Time to battle me, Olivia!

acerola.name: Acerola
acerola.quote1: Nanu said he was not felling up to be an Elite 4
acerola.quote2: So I guess I'll just have to battle hard enough to make up for his not being here!

kahili.name: Kahili
kahili.quote1: I heard that they'd made a Pokémon League in my own home region, so I came flying back to serve Alola.

marnie.name: Marnie/Hop/Bede
marnie.quote1: The truth is... I really just wanna become Champion for myself! So don't take it personal when I kick your butt!
marnie.quote2: It's time I finish what I started that day... Got it? The one who'll become Champion is me!
marnie.quote3: It's time to prove I'm a notch above the competition to everyone in the Galar region.

nessa.name: Nessa
nessa.quote1: I'm sure you remember, but I'm Nessa. And I'm not here to chat. I'm here to win!

bea.name: Bea/Allister
bea.quote1: Focusing too much on winning can cause one to make mistakes. I will face you with a clear head!

raihan.name: Raihan
raihan.quote1: You're really something else, kid. You've made it all the way here!
raihan.quote2: You might be thinking that you beat me once already... But I'm not the same Raihan you faced before

brock.name: Brock
brock.quote1: Fine, then! Show me your best!

misty.name: Misty
misty.quote1: My policy is an all out offensive with Water-type Pokémon!

surge.name: Lt. Surge
surge.quote1: I tell you, kid, electric Pokémon saved me during the war!
surge.quote2: They zapped my enemies into paralysis!
surge.quote3: The same as I'll do to you!

erika.name: Erika
erika.quote1: ...Oh, I'm sorry, I had no idea that you wished to challenge me.
erika.quote2: Very well, but I shall not lose.

koga.name: Koga
koga.quote1: Very well, I shall show you true terror as a ninja master!
koga.quote2: Despair to the creeping horror of Poison-type Pokémon!

sabrina.name: Sabrina
sabrina.quote1: I had a vision of your arrival!
sabrina.quote2: I dislike battling, but if you wish, I will show you my powers!

blaine.name: Blaine
blaine.quote1: Hah! I am Blaine, the red-hot Leader of Cinnabar Gym!
blaine.quote2: My fiery Pokémon are all ready with intense heat!

giovanni.name: Giovanni
giovanni.quote1: So be it. This time, I'm not holding back!
giovanni.quote2: You shall face Giovanni, the greatest Trainer!

falkner.name: Falkner
falkner.quote1: I'll show you the real power of the magnificent bird Pokémon!

bugsy.name: Bugsy
bugsy.quote1: My research is going to make me an authority on Bug-type Pokémon!
bugsy.quote2: Let me demonstrate what I've learned from my studies.

morty.name: Morty
morty.quote1: It's said that a rainbow-hued Pokémon will come down to appear before a truly powerful Trainer.
morty.quote2: I believe that person is me!
morty.quote3: You're going to help me reach that level!

chuck.name: Chuck
chuck.quote1: I have to warn you that I am a strong Trainer training every day under this waterfall!
chuck.quote2: Come on. We shall do battle!

jasmine.name: Jasmine
jasmine.quote1: I'm Jasmine, a Gym Leader. I use the...clang! Steel type!
jasmine.quote2: They are very hard, cold, sharp, and really strong! Um... I'm not lying.

pryce.name: Pryce
pryce.quote1: I have been training Pokémon since before you were born. I do not lose easily.
pryce.quote2: I, Pryce - the Winter Trainer - shall demonstrate my power!

clair.name: Clair
clair.quote1: I am Clair. The world's best Dragon-type master.
clair.quote2: As a Gym Leader, I will use my full power against any opponent!

roxanne.name: Roxanne
roxanne.quote1: Now, would you kindly demonstrate how you battle with your Pokémon?

brawly.name: Brawly
brawly.quote2: So you want to challenge me? Let me see what you're made of!

wattson.name: Wattson
wattson.quote2: I, Wattson, the Leader of Mauville Gym, shall electrify you!

flannery.name: Flannery
flannery.quote2: No, I mean… I'm Flannery, and I'm in charge here!
flannery.quote3: I'm gonna, uh, demonstrate the hot moves we've honed in this land!

norman.name: Norman
norman.quote1: I will do everything within my power as a Gym Leader to win!
norman.quote2: You'd better give it your best shot, too!

winona.name: Winona
winona.quote1: I am Winona. I am the Leader of the Fortree Pokémon Gym.
winona.quote2: Witness the elegant choreography of my bird Pokémon and me!

liza-tate.name: Liza & Tate
liza-tate.quote1: Were you surprised? That there are two Gym Leaders?
liza-tate.quote3: This combination of ours... Can you beat it?

wallace.name: Wallace
wallace.quote1: Allow me to formally introduce myself. I am Wallace. The Gym Leader of Sootopolis.
wallace.quote2: Now, show me. Show me the power you wield with your Pokémon.

roark.name: Roark
roark.quote1: This is the Oreburgh Pokémon Gym! I'm Roark, the Gym Leader!
roark.quote2: As the Gym Leader, I need to see your potential as a Trainer.

gardenia.name: Gardenia
gardenia.quote1: You have a winning aura about you.
gardenia.quote2: So, anyway, this will be fun. Let's have our battle!

maylene.name: Maylene
maylene.quote1: I will do the best I can as the Gym Leader.
maylene.quote2: I take battling very seriously. Whenever you're ready!

crasher-wake.name: Crasher Wake
crasher-wake.quote1: My Pokémon were toughened up by stormy white waters!
crasher-wake.quote2: Victory will be ours! Come on, let's get it done!

fantina.name: Fantina
fantina.quote2: But I shall win. That is what a Gym Leader does, non?

byron.name: Byron
byron.quote2: But that's no surprise. He still has much to learn.
byron.quote3: I, Byron, will take your challenge!

candice.name: Candice
candice.quote1: Sure thing! I was waiting for someone tough!
candice.quote2: It's all about focus! I'll show you just what I mean. Get ready to lose!

volkner.name: Volkner
volkner.quote1: Sigh... I'm Volkner, the Gym Leader.
volkner.quote2: I hope you're the Trainer who'll make me remember how fun it is to battle!

cilan-chili-cress.name: Cilan/Chili/Cress
cilan-chili-cress.quote1: So, um, if you're OK with me, I'll, um, put everything I've got into being, er, you know, your opponent.
cilan-chili-cress.quote2: Yeeeeooow! Time to play with FIRE!! I'm the strongest of us brothers!
cilan-chili-cress.quote3: What incredible luck for you--you get to battle the best among the three of us.

lenora.name: Lenora
lenora.quote1: The director of the Nacrene Museum and the Nacrene Gym's Leader is me! Lenora!
lenora.quote2: Well then, challenger, I'm going to research how you battle with the Pokémon you've so lovingly raised!

burgh.name: Burgh
burgh.quote1: My bug Pokémon are scurrying with excitement about getting to battle you.

elesa.name: Elesa
elesa.quote2: My beloved Pokémon and your Pokémon shall compete!
elesa.quote3: We're going to see whose star shines brightest!

clay.name: Clay
clay.quote1: Think it's about time to see fer myself what it is about yer skills that makes a Gym Leader like Elesa take such a shine to ya.

skyla.name: Skyla
skyla.quote1: Hee-hee! I've been waiting for you.
skyla.quote2: Did you enjoy flying with the help of the Mistralton Gym cannons?

brycen.name: Brycen
brycen.quote1: I'm Brycen... Pleased to meet you...
brycen.quote2: You appear ready to face a Gym Leader. Then... Bring it!

drayden-iris.name: Drayden/Iris
drayden-iris.quote1: Welcome. Thank you for coming. I am Opelucid Pokémon Gym's Leader, Drayden. I'm searching for now is a young Trainer who can show me a bright future. Perhaps you can show me that future, the way Iris has?
drayden-iris.quote2: Hi! I'm Iris, the amazing strong Gym Leader! Tell me... What Pokémon are you using? How will you fight? Ooh, I'm super curious, so let's just get started!

viola.name: Viola
viola.quote1: It's fantastic! Just fantastic! A great subject for my camera!
viola.quote2: My lens is always focused on victory--I won't let anything ruin this shot!

grant.name: Grant
grant.quote1: I've been waiting in eager anticipation! For a worthy challenger to appear!
grant.quote2: I hope you'll show me that your skill as a Trainer surpasses even mine.

korrina.name: Korrina
korrina.quote1: I'm not exactly sure, but I think Lucario is saying it wants to battle with you.

ramos.name: Ramos
ramos.quote2: My sturdy plants are a sign o' my strength as a gardener and a Gym Leader! Yeh sure yer up to facing all that?

clemont.name: Clemont
clemont.quote1: Let's both do our best in battle.

valerie.name: Valerie
valerie.quote1: Oh, if it isn't a young Trainer...
valerie.quote2: The elusive Fairy types may appear frail as a breeze and delicate as a bloom, but they are strong.

olympia.name: Olympia
olympia.quote1: A ritual to decide your fate and future.

wulfric.name: Wulfric
wulfric.quote1: Ice is both extremely hard and terribly fragile at the same time.
wulfric.quote2: Let's get this show on the road!

ilima.name: Ilima
ilima.quote2: My trial is held in Verdant Cavern. The trial of Captain Ilima.

hala.name: Hala
hala.quote2: I am Hala, the kahuna of Melemele Island.

lana-kiawe-mallow.name: Lana/Kiawe/Mallow
lana-kiawe-mallow.quote1: Hello. I'm Lana. I serve as the captain of Brooklet Hill.
lana-kiawe-mallow.quote2: I am Kiawe. My Marowak and I are students of the ancient dances.
lana-kiawe-mallow.quote3: I'm Mallow, one of the captains here! Your Pokémon look ready to cook with gas!

olivia.name: Olivia
olivia.quote1: Now you face the grand trial of the kahuna—me!
olivia.quote2: Get ready for your hardest Pokémon battle yet on Akala!

sophocles-acerola.name: Sophocles/Acerola
sophocles-acerola.quote1: Mm-hmm. I've gotta show Big Mo how strong I can be...
sophocles-acerola.quote2: My trial takes place at the abandoned site where the supermarket used to be.

nanu.name: Nanu
nanu.quote2: I'm an island kahuna, you know. Battle against me.

mina.name: Mina
mina.quote1: Have a battle against Captain Mina!
mina.quote2: Me and my team are all full-powered to the max!

hapu.name: Hapu
hapu.quote1: This is the first grand trial of Kahuna Hapu! I will battle you with everything that I have got!

milo.name: Milo
milo.quote1: Sure seems like you understand Pokémon real well.
milo.quote2: This is gonna be a doozy of a battle!

nessa.name: Nessa
nessa.quote2: No matter what kind of plan your refined mind may be plotting, my partner and I will be sure to sink it.

kabu.name: Kabu
kabu.quote1: Welcome! I am Kabu, the Fire-type Gym Leader.
kabu.quote2: The match is decided by which side is able to unleash their true potential.

bea-allister.name: Bea/Allister
bea-allister.quote1: Welcome, Gym Challenger. I'm Bea. Do you have an unshakable spirit that won't be moved, no matter how you are attacked? I think I'll just test that out, shall I?

opal.name: Opal
opal.quote2: Let me have a look at how you and your partner Pokémon behave!

gordie-melony.name: Gordie/Melony
gordie-melony.quote1: Hey there. The name's Gordie. Let's get this over with, Challenger!
gordie-melony.quote2: I am Melony. As you can clearly see, I've assembled a team of all Ice-type Pokémon. All righty, I suppose we should get started.

piers.name: Piers
piers.quote2: Get ready for a mosh pit with me and my party! Spikemuth, it's time to rock!

raihan.name: Raihan
raihan.quote1: You aim to defeat Leon... Do you have any idea just how high a hurdle that is?
raihan.quote2: As his greatest rival, I guess that I—Raihan—will have to show you!

blue.name: Blue
blue.quote1: Let's check out our Pokémon! Come on, I'll take you on!

silver.name: Silver
silver.quote1: I too have a good Pokémon. I'll show you what I mean!

wally.name: Wally
wally.quote1: Please see how much my training has accomplished!

barry.name: Barry
barry.quote1: You aren't the only one who's getting tougher! I'll prove it to you! Let's go!

n.name: N
n.quote1: Let me hear your Pokémon's voice!

calem-serena.name: Calem/Serena
calem-serena.quote1: I'm a Pokémon Trainer, I want to see things that make Pokémon special.
calem-serena.quote2: My Pokémon and I will show you what makes us special!

gladion.name: Gladion
gladion.quote1: Battle me. I won't take no for an answer.

bede.name: Bede
bede.quote1: It's time to prove I'm a notch above the competition to everyone in the Galar region
